title: Claude 3.7 Sonnet & Claude Code Technical Review: A Developer's Dream
title1: Claude 3.7 Sonnet & Claude Code Technical Review: A Developer's Dream
title2: Claude 3.7 Sonnet & Claude Code Technical Review: A Developer's Dream
description: Claude has often been praised as the best LLM for coding. Claude 3.7 takes this a huge step further with its new reasoning abilities and the new Claude Code CLI tool. We dive deep into the technical details and see how Claude 3.7 compares to other popular models and whether Claude Code is a game-changer for developers.
author: Yusuf
